duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely move all parts in and around the warehouse and data center environment using a variety of technology and equipment.
Provide supervisor leadership support to designated team members during shift assignments.
Act as a Leadership POC to the Client and other operational teams for service assistance and escalations.
Oversee and supervise 3-4 logistics personnel for assigned operations.
Direct and review work plan for assigned staff within assigned area.
Maintain strict inventory control and conduct accurate system transactions.
Transport inventory by hand, material handling equipment, and box truck in accordance with all safety procedures and protocol.
Lead the implementation and maintenance of 5S standard within all operational areas.
Escalate all areas of service non-compliance in a timely and effective manner to support investigation and remediation.
Ensure the participation of assigned Team members in all assigned in training to support the execution of their assigned responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of experience in warehouse, inventory, or related field (Preferred)
6+ months in a supervisory or leadership role (Preferred)
Proficient in MS Office, specifically Excel (Preferred)
